        RELEASE NAME ..... CoreAVC H.264 Video Codec Professional v1.7.0.0

<------------------------------------------------------------------------------>

  PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

                 CoreAVC H.264 Video Codec Professional v1.7.0.0

   The CoreCodec CoreAVC High Definition H.264 video codec is based on the
   MPEG-4 Part 10 standard and is one of the codecs used in Blu-ray and in
   HD-DVD.

   AVC / H.264 is the next-generation standard for video, and CoreAVC is
   being recognized as being the world&#039;s fastest H.264 software video
   decoder.

   The efficiency of CoreAVC in &#039;software&#039; is often compared to be faster
   than other solutions that try to rely on &#039;hardware&#039; to increase playback
   performance of H.264 video.

   CoreAVC H.264 Video Codec - Version 1.7.0.0 (20080415)
    - Add: Support for Mainconcept and ArcSoft demuxers.
    - Add: Workaround for broken DirectShowSource in AviSynth
    - Add: Installer improved
    - Add: Better multiple CPUs/Cores balance
    - Fix: Others internal fixes

<------------------------------------------------------------------------------>

  INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS

   1. Unzip and Unrar.

   2. Run coreavc_professional_edition-setup.exe to install.

   3. Use the keygen in the EDGE dir to generate your serial number.

   4. Enjoy!

<------------------------------------------------------------------------------>

  WE ARE DEDICATED TO QUALITY, NOT QUANTITY, AND WE ARE DOING IT FOR THE LULZ!
